html:
əwənki-l šinkən-ə əjač-i-ɣnə-rə əjakin-da-n
Evenki-PL.[NOM] luck-ACC.INDF ask-EP-HAB.DRV-AOR.[3PL]
rightsholder: Däbritz, Chris Lasse; Gusev, Valentin; Stoynova, Natalia. 2024. INEL Evenki Corpus. Version 2.0. Publication date 2024-12-31. Archived at Universität Hamburg. https://hdl.handle.net/11022/0000-0007-FE38-D
trs: The Evenkis ask for luck, they tell fortunes.

html:
i-li šuru-dʼa-ni ta-du loko-kol torɣa-j platka-n

srcwordsbare: i-li šuru-dʼa-ni ta-du loko-kol torɣa-j platka-n
trs: Wherever you go, hang up a scrap of cloth, a scarf!

rightsholder: Däbritz, Chris Lasse; Gusev, Valentin; Stoynova, Natalia. 2024. INEL Evenki Corpus. Version 2.0. Publication date 2024-12-31. Archived at Universität Hamburg. https://hdl.handle.net/11022/0000-0007-FE38-D
trs: If they can't [kill an animal], they go through a tree.

srcwordsbare: čalba-kan-ə pašit-kəl tar čalba-kan-du kresta-ja o-dʼa-kal
trs: Chop up a birch tree and make a cross on it.

html:

top.[NOM]-3SG intact.[NOM] be-SBJV.[3SG] butt-ACC-3SG

trs: The crown of the tree must be whole — cut the root, chop it up and make a cross on the crown of the birch!

srcwordsbare: əɣnikan-mi wa-kəl da mujala-wa-n loko-kol torɣa-ka-nə
trs: Kill a reindeer calf and hang up its neck hair with a rag.

srcwordsbare: loskutka-war loko-kol oŋokto-tʼ uj-kal tar kresta-du

trs: Then, when you have burnt off the bacon fat, go into the tree, go through the centre!

that-DAT/LOC tallow-ACC

srcwordsbare: ta-du imun-ma girʼan-dʼa-ni nʼanakin-ma ta-li əlɣə-kəl
trs: Then you smear grease on it and lead the dog through it!

rightsholder: Däbritz, Chris Lasse; Gusev, Valentin; Stoynova, Natalia. 2024. INEL Evenki Corpus. Version 2.0. Publication date 2024-12-31. Archived at Universität Hamburg. https://hdl.handle.net/11022/0000-0007-FE38-D
